reviews.review_msg:
Homework questions are waaay to hard.  I stumped my physics tutor with most of the problems she gave us.   The midterm was extremely brutal... 
 Take physics 121... its calculus ladden but at least its straight forward

This woman is the devil. Not only does she stink at teaching, but is completely out of touch with her class. She is impersonnable,boring,weird, and what is up with her hair? It was like she was lecturing with a dead, wet cat on her head.

Homework took hours and hours of effort and could not be completed unless you got help.
 Midterms were long and hard.
 And if you expected to be given some slack on the final? Ha! Expect marks in the %30 range.

He is a very adaptable prof and will generally change a couple things, ex. due dates, grading, when requested and is acceptable. Lectures are based off of pre-lectures so make sure you do those or you will be lost. He gives a lot of homework but it is not super difficult. Midterms are long and slightly difficult but the final is not too bad.
I liked the teaching style. Marking is scary, since tests are super hard, but he then rewards people who really try to figure out test and you get good grade!!

MAN IS AWESOME! He left iclicker out all the time so everyone could change their answer. He wants the highest avg so basically he wants everyone to get the highest marks. He is so kind and appreciative. His accent is ok but he does really care for his students. His exams are fair but long. He always scales up A LOT anyway so most of the time u g

Dr. Stelzer is an amazing lecturer and always cared. It is hard to contact him by email as he is extremely busy with everything, so I suggest you bring up your concerns during office hours as he is genuine and extremely patient. He loves what he does with a passion and exams were fair, if not they were scaled to meet standard; mark only goes up.
First and third midterm were fair. Impossible final exam. Gave the class false hope in the final and it was HEAVILY scaled.
overall fair midterms and okay lecturer. final exam was very hard. i would take another class with him.

Not a good prof to be teaching physics. Explanation of concepts are sometimes confusing, wording on exams are confusing. Her notes are contradictory at times. Level of understanding the way she teaches does not equal the level required to do her exams. Overall..bad prof
Extremely BORING. Lecture notes are hard to follow.  Makes a lot of mistakes in the lecture.
no, she couldnt cut her hair, coz her hair is needed to do the demonstration of static-electricity, like when she's touching the dome thingy, her hair will stick out.
his tests are so so hard...-_- ... he always act funny... his note is bad, cant read his writing...
